description: Enables voice control of  a Physics Systems automation server via Amazon Alexa. Requires an active PSNET account to function. Before operating this skill, you must login with your PSNET account credentials in order to pair your Amazon account with PSNET. This will ordinarily be done for you by your dealer or installer.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, tell my physics to power down living room
Alexa, tell my physics to play in kitchen
Alexa, tell my physics to watch tv in master bedroom
name: Physics Systems Server
shortDescription: Enables voice control of a Physics Systems automation server.
